data.title: Tactical Pistol 1
data.meta_description: A class that allows the student to advance their tactical training readying them for a more tactical focus.
data.text:
TUITION:

$350.00 (Does not include ammo, firearm, and equipment)

​

COURSE LENGTH:

4 HOURS

PARTICIPANTS:

Minimum 2, Maximum 6

PREREQUISITES:

Beginner Pistol

Holster 1

Holster 2

RESERVATION:

Time and Date To Be Determined

PURPOSE:

A class that allows the student to advance their tactical training readying them for a more tactical focus.

AREAS OF FOCUS:

Kit Placement/Setup

Retention Shooting

Strong Hand, Weak hand Shooting

Speed Reload & Tactical (TAC) Reload

Cover and Concealment

Shooting from Kneeling Position

​​

EQUIPMENT NEEDED:
